structurePlacementLogging.desc:: Enables debug logging of structure placement. Warning: This will spam the logs and is only recommended for debugging purposes. Default: false

structureSearchTimeout.desc:: The maximum time (in seconds) a structure search is allowed to take. Default: 50

useFastStructureLookup.desc:: Enables faster structure search. Default: true

mapSearchRadius.desc:: Specifies the maximum radius map items can search for structures. Lowering this value reduces the time structure searches stall the server but decreases the range in which structures are found. Vanilla: 50, Default: 40

locateSearchRadius.desc:: Sets the search radius for the locate structure command. Vanilla: 100, Default: 110

globalSearchRadius.desc:: Sets the global maximum structure search radius. The vanilla locate command uses 100. Lowering this value reduces the time structure searches stall the server but decreases the range in which structures are found. Default: 70

spacingSeparationModifier.desc:: Adjusts the structure spacing (average spawn distance) and separation (minimum spawn distance). Increasing the value makes structures spawn farther apart, while decreasing it makes them spawn closer together. Vanilla Default: 1.0

autoBiomeCompat.desc:: Automatically analyzes present biomes and adjust structure spawning to include fitting ones. Default: true

autoBiomeCompatLogging.desc:: Enables logging for the autoBiomeCompat feature. Default: false

autoBiomeCompatStrictness.desc:: Sets a modifier for how strict the autoBiomeCompat is, lower allows adding less similar biomes to be added. E.g. 0.5 decreases the similarity requirements by 50% . Default: 1.0

warnMissingRegistryEntry.desc:: Prevents crashes due to missing registry entries (e.g., changes in mod structure IDs) by converting them into log error messages instead. Default: true

disableLegacyRandomCrashes.desc:: Prevents crashes caused by multithreaded access to thread-specific random number generators. Default: true
